Description: Enhancements and customizations to the of mentions of the game, their recognition and their highlighting.

DropdownSettings.Name: ToS 1 Highlight
DropdownSettings.Description: Instead of the colored background it changes the whole chat color.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Non-Mentions Highlights
CheckboxSettings.Description: If someone says your number, the game will highlight the number.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Highlight Non-Mention Message
CheckboxSettings.Description: If someone says your number, it will highlight the whole chat message be as if someone had mentioned you.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Just show the numbers
CheckboxSettings.Description: Mentions will only show the Player Number image, and not the name. "Player Mention Effects" setting must be in "Show Player Number" for this to do any changes.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Other's Mentions colored
CheckboxSettings.Description: If someone mentions someone and you know their role, it will be colored of their faction.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Color My Mention
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will apply "Other's Mentions colored" to your mention too.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Other's number colored
CheckboxSettings.Description: If someone writes the number of someone(not mention nor you) and you know their role, it will be colored of their faction.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Color My Number
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will apply "Other's number colored" to your number too.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Mention Panel Colored
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will apply the settings to color numbers to the mentions on the panel that appears when you start typing a mention.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Colored Input's Mentions
CheckboxSettings.Description: Settings like "Color My Mention" will apply to the chatbox, will, notes, etc.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Only Numbers in Inputs
CheckboxSettings.Description: You will only write the numbers on mentions in your input ("Just show the numbers" not needed).

CheckboxSettings.Name: ToS 2 Highlight W ToS 1's
CheckboxSettings.Description: When a highlight from tos1 appears, the tos2 highlight will also be shown.

ColorPickerSettings.Name: ToS 2 Highlight Color
ColorPickerSettings.Description: Changes the color of the colored background that appears when someone mentions you.

ColorPickerSettings.Name: ToS 1 Highlight Color
ColorPickerSettings.Description: Changes the color of the text when a ToS1 highlight occurs.

ColorPickerSettings.Name: Base Mentions Color
ColorPickerSettings.Description:
Changes the default color of Mentions.
<color=red>* RESTART OF THE GAME REQUIRED.</color>

SliderSettings.Name: Highlight Opacity
SliderSettings.Description: The amount of opacity that the colored background has. Default: 40%.
